mapper.select:
SELECT t1.id, t1.task_id, t1.task_type, t1.from_user_id, t1.to_user_id, t1.org_id, t1.validate_state, t1.created_by, t1.created, t1.last_upd_by, t1.last_upd, t1.remark
FROM JBPM4_CONSIGNED_TASK t1 WHERE t1.task_id=#{str}
select count(*) from tabs t where t.TABLE_NAME='JBPM4_CONSIGNED_TASK_OLD'
mapper.insert:
insert into JBPM4_CONSIGNED_TASK_OLD ( id, task_id, task_type, from_user_id, to_user_id, org_id, validate_state, created_by, created, last_upd_by, last_upd, remark )( select ct.id, ct.task_id, ct.task_type, ct.from_user_id, ct.to_user_id, ct.org_id, ct.validate_state, ct.created_by, ct.created, ct.last_upd_by, ct.last_upd, ct.remark from JBPM4_CONSIGNED_TASK ct ,jbpm4_hist_actinst ha, JBPM4_HIST_PROCINST hp where ha.htask_=ct.task_id and hp.dbid_=ha.hproci_ and hp.end_<=to_date(#{str},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') and hp.state_!='active'
)

insert into JBPM4_CONSIGNED_TASK_TMP ( id, task_id, task_type, from_user_id, to_user_id, org_id, validate_state, created_by, created, last_upd_by, last_upd, remark )( select ct.id, ct.task_id, ct.task_type, ct.from_user_id, ct.to_user_id, ct.org_id, ct.validate_state, ct.created_by, ct.created, ct.last_upd_by, ct.last_upd, ct.remark from JBPM4_CONSIGNED_TASK ct ,jbpm4_hist_actinst ha, JBPM4_HIST_PROCINST hp where ha.htask_=ct.task_id and hp.dbid_=ha.hproci_ and hp.end_<=to_date(#{str},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') and hp.state_!='active' )

insert into JBPM4_CONSIGNED_TASK_OLD ( id, task_id, task_type, from_user_id, to_user_id, org_id, validate_state, created_by, created, last_upd_by, last_upd, remark )( SELECT t1.id, t1.task_id, t1.task_type, t1.from_user_id, t1.to_user_id, t1.org_id, t1.validate_state, t1.created_by, t1.created, t1.last_upd_by, t1.last_upd, t1.remark
FROM JBPM4_CONSIGNED_TASK t1,jbpm4_hist_task ht,jbpm4_hist_actinst ha, JBPM4_HIST_PROCINST hp where ht.dbid_=t1.task_id and ha.htask_=ht.dbid_ and hp.dbid_=ha.hproci_ and hp.id_=#{str} )
mapper.update: create table JBPM4_CONSIGNED_TASK_OLD as select * from JBPM4_CONSIGNED_TASK a where a.id=0
create table JBPM4_CONSIGNED_TASK_TMP as select * from JBPM4_CONSIGNED_TASK a where a.id=0
mapper.delete: delete from JBPM4_CONSIGNED_TASK t where exists (select temp.id from JBPM4_CONSIGNED_TASK_TMP temp where t.id=temp.id)
delete FROM JBPM4_CONSIGNED_TASK t1 WHERE t1.task_id=#{str}
